name: commerce-sdk-integration-test
description: Salesforce Commerce Cloud SDK Integration Test

scripts.fetch:internal: npm pack ../packages/core && npm pack ../packages/generator && npm install
scripts.test:integration: npm run fetch:internal &&  npm run test
scripts.test:integration:redis: fetch:internal && npm run redis --prefix ../packages/core && npm run test; npm run redis:shutdown --prefix ../packages/core
scripts.test:integration:redis:debug: fetch:internal && npm run redis --prefix ../packages/core && npm run test; npm run redis:shutdown:debug --prefix ../packages/core
